scripts.build: yarn workspace sheenlet-app build && yarn post-build
scripts.post-build: cd ../../python_modules/sheenlet/sheenlet && rm -rf webapp && mkdir -p webapp && cp -r ../../../js_modules/sheenlet/packages/app/build ./webapp/ && mkdir -p webapp/build/vendor && cp -r graphql-playground ./webapp/build/vendor
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @sheenlet/sheenlet-app lint && yarn workspace @sheenlet/sheenlet-core lint && yarn workspace @sheenlet/ui lint
scripts.ts: yarn workspace @sheenlet/sheenlet-app ts && yarn workspace @sheenlet/ui ts
